Key Match Events: Shivam Dube played an unbeaten 60 runs off 34 balls to lead India to a six-wicket win
Post-Match Reflections: India's Mukesh Kumar and Afghanistan's Rahmanullah Gurbaz had a mix-up that led to Rohit Sharma's dismissal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The start of the game was delayed due to a flickering blue light around the sightscreen
Others: Afghanistan's opening batsmen struggled to rotate strike in the powerplay
